attributes.action: Make fuel cheaper for students who are in full time-education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel prices are rising through the roof, and students like myself need transport in one way or another. I live 10 miles away from the nearest shop nevermind petrol station and on £30 of EMA a week, this is simply just not enough for my transport costs. If any student feels the same way, please sign.
